StringProperty.Name: MatlabRoot
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the MATLAB installation root directory to use for compilation. This can be obtained by running 'matlabroot' at the MATLAB prompt.

StringListProperty.Name: Matlab_IncludePath
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the MATLAB and Simulink directories to be added to the include path. This path contains 'mex.h'.

StringListProperty.Name: Matlab_LibraryPath
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the MATLAB directories containing linkage libraries.

StringListProperty.Name: Matlab_Dependencies
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the MATLAB libraries to be linked.
